entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
